DOC.detailed_description: The purpose randomize , double-blind , crossover study identify dietary nitrate supplementation improve strength , endurance , power measurement male CrossFit athlete . Specifically , strength measurement take use isometric isokinetic test Biodex dynamometer . Endurance measure use time trial 2000 meter row test `` Fran '' CrossFit workout . Finally , power analyze use Wingate cycle test . The treatment group receive 1 serve f potassium nitrate KNO3- ( N ) ( 8 mmols NO3- ) . The placebo group receive 1 serve nitrate-free placebo ( PL ) potassium chloride ( 8 mmol KCl ) . The participant complete two three-day baseline testing , six-day supplementation period follow round baseline test . Following first six-day supplementation period , 10 day washout period second baseline test begin .
